Director - General Roberto Azevêdo , in a lecture at the Institute for Global Economics in Seoul on 16 May 2014 , thanked Korea for playing a crucial role in delivering the Bali package .
For the post-Bali work of the WTO , he said that as a middle grounder in the Doha negotiations , Korea can help to bridge the gap between developed and developing country members .
